text: Ricardo Manuel Ciciliano Bustillo (September 23, 1976 - September 17, 2020) was a Colombian football midfielder. Ciciliano was born in Barranquilla, Colombia. He mainly played for Millonarios F.C. with 65 appearances and with Juan Aurich with 58 appearances. Ciciliano died on September 17, 2020 at a hospital in Barranquilla from pneumonia caused by COVID-19, aged 43.Falleció Ricardo Ciciliano tras luchar contra una neumonía ==References== Category:1976 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Colombian footballers Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Colombia
title: Ricardo Ciciliano
